name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of robust experience in developing high-performance applications tailored for diverse industries, particularly healthcare and finance. Proficient in **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and supporting technologies such as **Tailwind**, **shadcn/ui**, and **Storybook**. Hands-on expertise in modern development practices using **Vitest**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring the delivery of efficient and scalable frontend solutions.
Demonstrated track record in deploying cloud-native architectures with **Azure Kubernetes Service** and leveraging **Pulumi** for infrastructure management. Experienced with CI/CD processes, utilizing **Flux** for streamlined deployments while maintaining code integrity using **GitHub**.
Excellent communicator with a collaborative mindset, skilled in rationalizing complex project requirements and aligning team efforts via tools such as **Linear**, **Notion**, and **Slack**. Strong background in integrating compliance measures, ensuring that solutions meet necessary standards.
